para_P.title: Is Will Hurd going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Will Hurd is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates currently listed; additional options may be introduced later.

For this inquiry, it does not matter who obtains the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is exclusively determined by who is appointed by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Conditional on Will Hurd being the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will the Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met:

1. Will Hurd is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This determination is not based on who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election, but solely on the selection by the Republican National Convention.

2. The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The data for this resolution will be sourced from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

If the first condition is not met, the question resolves to N/A.

not_P.title: Conditional on Will Hurd not being the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will the Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by 0.1% or less in July 2024?
not_P.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met:

1. Will Hurd is not selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This determination is not based on who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election, but solely on the selection by the Republican National Convention.

2. The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by 0.1% or less compared to June 2024. The data for this resolution will be sourced from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

If the first condition is not met, the question resolves to N/A.

para_P.title: Assuming that Will Hurd becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will the Month-over-Month US Core CPI rise by over 0.1% in July 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if both of the subsequent criteria are satisfied:

1. Will Hurd is chosen by the delegates at the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This decision is not based on who is awarded the Republican nomination on election day in 2024, but strictly on the choice made by the Republican National Convention.

2. The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase of more than 0.1% relative to June 2024. The data for this conclusion will be obtained from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will utilize the precise (not rounded) figure.

If the first criterion is not fulfilled, the question will be resolved as N/A.

question.title: Conditional on both Will Hurd being the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and the US Core CPI increasing by more than 0.1% in July 2024, will Mayor Wilson show at the Roswell City Council Open Forum on July 29th, 2024?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: (a) Will Hurd is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (b) the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024, using the exact (not rounded) value from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL. Then, given these conditions, will Mayor Kurt Wilson be physically present or confirmed via Zoom (with camera on and identification) at the Roswell City Council Meeting on July 29th, 2024? If he is present or confirmed as described, the question resolves to yes; otherwise, it resolves to no.

not_P.title: Conditional on both Will Hurd not being the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election or the US Core CPI not increasing by more than 0.1% in July 2024, will Mayor Wilson not show at the Roswell City Council Open Forum on July 29th, 2024?
not_P.body: Suppose the following is true: (a) Will Hurd is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or (b) the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 does not increase by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024, using the exact (not rounded) value from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL. Then, given these conditions, will Mayor Kurt Wilson not be physically present or confirmed via Zoom (with camera on and identification) at the Roswell City Council Meeting on July 29th, 2024? If he is not present or confirmed as described, the question resolves to yes; otherwise, it resolves to no.

para_P.title: Assuming both that Will Hurd is the chosen candidate for the Republican Party in the 2024 US Presidential Election and that the US Core CPI rises by over 0.1% in July 2024, will Mayor Wilson attend the Roswell City Council Open Forum on July 29th, 2024?
para_P.body: Let us consider the following conditions: (a) Will Hurd is nominated by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (b) the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% in comparison to June 2024, using the precise (not rounded) figure from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL. Under these circumstances, will Mayor Kurt Wilson be either physically present or confirmed via Zoom (with the camera on and proper identification) at the Roswell City Council Meeting on July 29th, 2024? If he is present or confirmed as stated, the answer is yes; if not, the answer is no.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Will Hurd be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and the Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July 2024? (b) Will Mayor Wilson show at the Roswell City Council Open Forum on July 29th, 2024?
question.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: 1) Will Hurd is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and 2) the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Mayor Kurt Wilson is physically present at the Roswell City Council Meeting on July 29th, 2024, or if he dials in on Zoom with confirmation of his identity (e.g., camera on, him speaking and identifying himself). Resolves to **No** if he isn't there.

For (a), it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following occur: (a) Will Hurd not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election or the Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by 0.1% or less in July 2024? (b) Will Mayor Wilson not show at the Roswell City Council Open Forum on July 29th, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met: 1) Will Hurd is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or 2) the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by 0.1% or less compared to June 2024. The data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Mayor Kurt Wilson is not physically present at the Roswell City Council Meeting on July 29th, 2024, and if he does not dial in on Zoom with confirmation of his identity (e.g., camera off, him not speaking or identifying himself). Resolves to **No** if he is there.

For (a), it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is not selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) Will Hurd be chosen as the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election and will the US Core CPI rise more than 0.1% in July 2024? (b) Will Mayor Wilson attend the Roswell City Council Open Forum on July 29th, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This question will be answered with **Yes** if both of the following conditions are satisfied: 1) Hurd is nominated by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and 2) the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase of more than 0.1% in comparison to June 2024. The resolution data will be sourced from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will utilize the precise (not rounded) figure.

(b) This question will be answered with **Yes** if Mayor Kurt Wilson is physically present at the Roswell City Council Meeting on July 29th, 2024, or if he connects via Zoom with verification of his identity (for example, having his camera on and verbally identifying himself). It resolves to **No** if he is not present.

For (a), it does not matter who is nominated on the day of the 2024 US election; it is determined solely by the selection made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

question.title: Conditional on Liz Cheney being the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will Kamala Harris’ VP pick be Kelly or Shapiro?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Liz Cheney is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This selection is determined solely by the delegates of the Republican National Convention and is not relevant to who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

Then, given this condition, will Kamala Harris announce her pick for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th? This resolves YES if Kamala Harris announces either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her running mate, and NO if she announces anyone else. The resolution will wait until the pick is confirmed by Kamala Harris herself.

not_P.title: Conditional on Liz Cheney being the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will Kamala Harris’ VP pick not be Kelly or Shapiro?
not_P.body:
Suppose the following is true: Liz Cheney is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Then, given this condition, will Kamala Harris announce her pick for running mate as someone other than Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th? This resolves YES if Kamala Harris announces someone other than Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her running mate, and NO if she announces either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro. The resolution will wait until the pick is confirmed by Kamala Harris herself.

para_P.title: If Liz Cheney is the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will Kamala Harris choose Kelly or Shapiro as her VP?

Assuming the following holds true: Liz Cheney is chosen by the Republican National Convention to be the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. The answer will be YES if Kamala Harris selects either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her running mate, and NO if she picks someone else. The decision will remain pending until it is confirmed by Kamala Harris herself.

question.title: Given Liz Cheney is the Republican nominee for President and Kamala Harris picks Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as VP, will the Republican Party retain Ohio's 6th district in the special election?
question.body:
Suppose the following occurs: (1) Liz Cheney is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (2) Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th, confirmed by her.

Then, will the Republican Party retain Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously held by Bill Johnson) in the 2024 special election?

Resolution criteria: The question resolves as Yes if credible sources report that a person representing the Republican Party has won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If no election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

not_P.title: Given Liz Cheney is the Republican nominee for President and Kamala Harris picks Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as VP, will the Republican Party not retain Ohio's 6th district in the special election?
not_P.body:
Suppose the following occurs: (1) Liz Cheney is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (2) Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th, confirmed by her.

Then, will the Republican Party not retain Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously held by Bill Johnson) in the 2024 special election?

Resolution criteria: The question resolves as Yes if there is no credible source reporting that a person representing the Republican Party has won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If no election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

para_P.title: If Liz Cheney becomes the Republican candidate for President and Kamala Harris selects either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her Vice President, will the Republican Party keep control of Ohio's 6th district in the upcoming special election?
para_P.body:
Imagine the following scenario: (1) Liz Cheney is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (2) Kamala Harris reveals her choice for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro prior to August 7th, confirmed by her.

Under these circumstances, will the Republican Party continue to hold Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously represented by Bill Johnson) in the special election of 2024?

Resolution criteria: The question is answered with a Yes if reliable sources indicate that a candidate from the Republican Party has won the special election for Ohio's 6th district. If there are conflicting reports from popular sources, an official statement or source from Ohio will be considered. If no election occurs before January 1, 2025, the question will be considered void.

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (1) Liz Cheney is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, (2) Kamala Harris picks either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her VP, and (3) the Republican Party retains Ohio's 6th congressional district in the 2024 special election?
question.body:
(1) Liz Cheney must be selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

(2) Kamala Harris must announce her pick for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th. The pick must be confirmed by Kamala Harris herself.

(3) This question will resolve as Yes if credible sources report that a person representing the Republican Party has won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If no election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

not_P.title: Will none of the following occur: (1) Liz Cheney is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, (2) Kamala Harris picks either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her VP, and (3) the Republican Party fails to retain Ohio's 6th congressional district in the 2024 special election?
not_P.body:
(1) Liz Cheney must not be selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election.

(2) Kamala Harris must not announce her pick for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th. The pick must not be confirmed by Kamala Harris herself.

(3) This question will resolve as Yes if no credible sources report that a person representing the Republican Party has won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If no election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

para_P.title: Is it possible that all of the following will take place: (1) Liz Cheney becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, (2) Kamala Harris selects either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her Vice President, and (3) the Republican Party successfully holds Ohio's 6th congressional district in the 2024 special election?
para_P.body:
(1) Liz Cheney needs to be chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This decision is made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, rather than who is announced as the Republican nominee on the day of the 2024 US election.

(2) Kamala Harris has to declare her choice for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro prior to August 7th. The selection must be verified by Kamala Harris herself.

(3) This question will be answered with Yes if reliable sources indicate that a representative of the Republican Party has secured victory in the special election for Ohio's 6th district. In cases of conflicting reports from popular sources, an official Ohio State source or statement will be referenced. If there is no election conducted before January 1, 2025, the question will be considered void.

question.title: Will Renew hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections and as **No** for all other outcomes. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.

not_P.title: Will Renew not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Renew does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections and as **No** for all other outcomes. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.

para_P.title: Will Renew secure the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Renew secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections, and with a **No** for any other results. In the event of a tie between two groups for seats, the resolution will depend on official announcements from the European Parliament or reliable media sources.

question.title: Conditional on Renew holding the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, will BJP form the government after the next Indian general election in 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. This question will resolve as **Yes** if Renew holds the most seats and as **No** for all other outcomes. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.

Then, given this, will the BJP have a member sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister following the next general elections? This question will resolve as **Yes** if the BJP forms the government and as **No** for all other outcomes.

The next Indian general election is expected to occur in May 2024, following any election after June 1, 2022.

not_P.title: Conditional on Renew holding the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, will BJP not form the government after the next Indian general election in 2024?
not_P.body:
Suppose the following is true: Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. This question will resolve as **Yes** if Renew holds the most seats and as **No** for all other outcomes. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.

Then, given this, will the BJP not have a member sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister following the next general elections? This question will resolve as **Yes** if the BJP does not form the government and as **No** for all other outcomes.

The next Indian general election is expected to occur in May 2024, following any election after June 1, 2022.

para_P.title: If Renew secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, will the BJP establish the government following the upcoming Indian general election in 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: Renew secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Renew secures the highest number of seats, and as **No** for any other scenarios. In the event of a tie between two groups for seats, the result will be determined based on official declarations from the European Parliament or reliable media sources.

With that in mind, will the BJP have an individual inaugurated as the next Prime Minister of India after the forthcoming general elections? This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if the BJP forms the government, and as **No** for any other scenarios.

The next general election in India is anticipated to take place in May 2024, following any election that occurs after June 1, 2022.

question.title: Given Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections AND BJP forms the government after the next Indian general election, will the Prime Minister of France belong to the Together coalition on July 30, 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if all of the following conditions are met: 
1. Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.
2. The BJP has a member sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister following the next general elections occurring after June 1, 2022 (currently expected for May 2024).
3. The party of the Prime Minister of France is Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

If any of these conditions is not met, the question resolves as **No**.

not_P.title: Given Renew does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections OR BJP does not form the government after the next Indian general election, will the Prime Minister of France not belong to the Together coalition on July 30, 2024?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is not met: 
1. Renew does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.
2. The BJP does not have a member sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister following the next general elections occurring after June 1, 2022 (currently expected for May 2024).
3. The party of the Prime Minister of France is not Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

If all of these conditions are met, the question resolves as **No**.

para_P.title: If Renew secures the highest number of seats in the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections AND the BJP establishes the government after the forthcoming Indian general election, will the French Prime Minister be a member of the Together coalition on July 30, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if all the following criteria are satisfied: 
1. Renew secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. In the event of a tie between two groups for seats, this resolution will depend on official announcements from the European Parliament or trustworthy media reports.
2. The BJP has a representative sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister after the general elections that are anticipated to occur after June 1, 2022 (currently projected for May 2024).
3. The political affiliation of the French Prime Minister is Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to reliable sources.

If any of these criteria are not fulfilled, the inquiry will resolve as **No**.

question.title: Will all of the following be true: (1) Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, (2) BJP forms the government after the next Indian general election in 2024, AND (3) the Prime Minister of France belongs to the Together coalition on July 30, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if all of the following conditions are met: (1) Renew holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports. (2) The BJP has a member sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister following the next general elections occurring after June 1, 2022 (currently expected for May 2024). (3) The party of the Prime Minister of France is Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. All other outcomes will resolve as **No**.

not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met: (1) Renew does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. If two groups are tied for seats, this resolution will consider the outcome based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports. (2) The BJP does not have a member sworn in as the next Indian Prime Minister following the next general elections occurring after June 1, 2022 (currently expected for May 2024). (3) The party of the Prime Minister of France is not Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. All other outcomes will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it the case that the following statements will all hold true: (1) After the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, Renew secures the highest number of seats, (2) the BJP establishes the government following the upcoming Indian general election in 2024, AND (3) on July 30, 2024, the Prime Minister of France is affiliated with the Together coalition?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if each of the subsequent criteria is satisfied: (1) Renew possesses the greatest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. In the event of a tie between two groups for the number of seats, the resolution will be based on official declarations from the European Parliament or reliable media sources. (2) The BJP has a representative officially inaugurated as the next Indian Prime Minister after the general elections taking place after June 1, 2022 (currently anticipated for May 2024). (3) The political party of the Prime Minister of France is Together on July 30, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to trustworthy sources. Any other results will conclude with **No**.

question.title: Conditional on "House of the Dragon" S2E7 being rated >8.5 on IMDB, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: "House of the Dragon" Season 2 Episode 7 receives an IMDB rating greater than 8.5 exactly two days after its release, as determined by the score displayed on IMDB at noon PT on July 30th. The rating must be a strict inequality, greater than 8.5, and will use the precision listed by IMDB (typically a single decimal). Given this condition, will Iran carry out an attack within Israel's borders that leads to the death of at least five individuals before May 1, 2024? This question resolves YES if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran has occurred within Israel's borders resulting in the death of at least five individuals. If the condition regarding the IMDB rating is not met, this question resolves as N/A.

Given this condition, will Iran not carry out an attack within Israel's borders that leads to the death of at least five individuals before May 1, 2024? This question resolves YES if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran has occurred within Israel's borders resulting in the death of at least five individuals. If the condition regarding the IMDB rating is not met, this question resolves as N/A.

question.title: Given Elon Musk attends Bitcoin Nashville 2024 and Linda Yaccarino is Twitter CEO on July 1, 2024, will Ron DeSantis be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This conditional question evaluates whether Ron DeSantis will be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, given that both of the following conditions are met: (a) Elon Musk becomes a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024, and (b) Linda Yaccarino is in the position of CEO at Twitter on July 1, 2024, according to official announcements from Twitter or credible media sources.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: This question will resolve as YES if Ron DeSantis is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as NO. This question is not restricted to candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. It is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

If the condition is not met (i.e., either Elon Musk does not attend the conference or Linda Yaccarino is not the CEO on the specified date), the question resolves as N/A.

(c) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Doug Burgum is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future. For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Given Larry Elder is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Larry Elder is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This means he is chosen by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, regardless of who is the nominee on the day of the election.

Then, is it true that there will be another Democratic party presidential debate? This resolves as YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Given Larry Elder is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, will there not be another Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body:

Then, is it true that there will not be another Democratic party presidential debate? This resolves as YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

It is answered with NO otherwise.

question.title: Given Larry Elder is the Republican nominee and there is another Democratic debate, will Russia control Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as YES if both of the following occur: (1) Larry Elder is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined solely by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not by who receives the nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. (2) There is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. 

Then, regarding the situation in Ukraine, it resolves as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories:

- Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine
- Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours
- Assessed Russian Control
- Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine
- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location

The question will resolve as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:

- Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours
- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives
- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare
- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

If the condition regarding Larry Elder and the Democratic debate is not met, the question resolves N/A.

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

para_P.title: Assuming Larry Elder is the Republican candidate and there is an upcoming Democratic debate, will Russia have control over Chasiv Yar by June 1, 2024?

This inquiry will conclude with a YES if both of the following conditions are satisfied: (1) Larry Elder is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. question.title: Will both of the following occur: (1) Larry Elder will be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and there will be another Democratic party presidential debate, and (2) Russia will have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as YES if all the following conditions are met: (1) Larry Elder is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, determined solely by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not by who receives the nomination on the day of the 2024 US election, and there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention.
